did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Brenda J. Marston's 1993 March on Washington memorabilia, 1993.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Program, broadsides, coupons, and other ephemera handed out at the 1993 March on Washington for Lesbian, Gay, and Bi Equal Rights and Liberation in Washington, DC. Also, a list of chants heard and t-shirts seen.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Program, broadsides, coupons, and other ephemera handed out at the 1993 March on Washington for Lesbian, Gay, and Bi Equal Rights and Liberation in Washington, DC. Also, a list of chants heard and t-shirts seen.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Brenda J. Marston's 1993 March on Washington memorabilia, #7705. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Ephemera from the 1993 March on Washington.
